item.dc:creator: @mrprostats1 mrprostats1

@mrprostats1 wrote:

dude wtf delta doesnt have some of the stuff like
//QUEST_1 OBJECTS
public boolean nonWild()
//portals
public void process()
how am i supposed to do those steps?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2009, 05:10:21 am[/size][hr][quote=“mod_lol1, post:10, topic:255927”]it gives an error because u need to add more.[/quote]
you got aim or something?

item.title: What are they talking about when they say declare this code [server.java]
item.dc:creator: @mrprostats1 mrprostats1
item.description:
@mrprostats1 wrote:

[quote=“mod_lol1, post:6, topic:255927”][quote author=mrprostats1 link=topic=338126.msg2624135#msg2624135 date=1231669786]

declare is that u need to explain it.

for example this code:

makeGlobalObject(2843, 2964, 61, -3, 10); // Ancient Alter

the server cant know what it is so u need :

 public void NewObjects() {

hope I helped a bit.

im on delta and it says open up server.java and declare this code
public void castleWars() {
if(Castlewars.gameTime == 0) {
zammyscore = 0;
sarascore = 0;
}
if(Castlewars.waitTime == 0) {
cwarssaramax = 0;
cwarszammymax = 0;
}
}
where am i supposed to put it?
[/quote]

add it just above dont care about where to add it.[/quote]
i compiled my first 2 steps i came up with error help me pleasE?
server.java:22: cannot find symbol
symbol : class Castlewars
location: class server
public static Castlewars Castlewars = null;
1 error
it has a arrow pointing to the second castlewar word

Read full topic

@mod_lol1 wrote:

[quote=“mrprostats1, post:5, topic:255927”][quote author=mod_lol1 link=topic=338126.msg2624133#msg2624133 date=1231669673]
declare is that u need to explain it.

for example this code:

makeGlobalObject(2843, 2964, 61, -3, 10); // Ancient Alter

the server cant know what it is so u need :

 public void NewObjects() {

hope I helped a bit.

[/quote]
im on delta and it says open up server.java and declare this code
public void castleWars() {
if(Castlewars.gameTime == 0) {
zammyscore = 0;
sarascore = 0;
}
if(Castlewars.waitTime == 0) {
cwarssaramax = 0;
cwarszammymax = 0;
}
}
where am i supposed to put it?[/quote]

add it just above dont care about where to add it.
